DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate effect first aid course first aid skill compare training . The study also evaluate effect first-aid instruction give emergency dispatch central mobile phone first aid performance instruction . Half participant perform first aid two scenario prior first aid training . Half participant perform first aid two scenario 4 5 month attend first aid course . Half participant ( overall ) receive first aid instruction mobile phone scenario .
DOC.brief_title: Better First Aid With First Aid Training Dispatcher Central Instructions ?
